Action.author: bmos299
Action.body: Do we need tasks here that go into details on all the items included in the daily tests? Part of the attraction here is that the maintainers can read exactly what the test is going and the benefit to running it. We could create one task where everyone puts their section or make individual sections. What do you all think?

Action.author: bmos299
Action.body: I just added task FAB-878 for this work.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: Closing. No more effort on v0.6.
